thread.title: Inji Iduppazhagi to release on October 9
thread.title_full: Inji Iduppazhagi to release on October 9 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Inji Iduppazhagi to release on October 9
text:
PVP Cinema has announced that its upcoming film Inji Iduppazhagi, will be releasing on the 9th of October. This Arya and Anushka Shetty-starrer created a huge sensation when it's teasers garnered close to 4 million views and has become one of the most anticipated releases of the year.
Anushka's look and the quirky content has created tremendous buzz for this movie and the expectation levels have sky rocketed. By announcing a confirmed release date, PVP cinema has started the countdown for the release and ensured that audience will have big entertainment for the festival season.
Inji Iduppazhagi also has Sonal Chauhan, Prakash Raj, Urvashi and others in important roles. Directed by Prakash Kovelamudi and produced by PVP Cinema, Inji Iduppazhagi has music by Maragathamani and has cinematography by Nirav Shah.
